reasoning: The user wants to create a JSON representation of an iterative plan for developing a simple TODO app. The plan involves several AI agents with specific roles. The JSON should outline the reasoning, roles, and ordered tasks, including dependencies, based on the provided markdown file and team member descriptions. The plan starts with parallelized Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extraction, followed by harmonization, prompt refinement, knowledge transfer, meta-reflection, and an iterative expansion cycle. The 'Unknown' role for 'fizzlametta' needs to be addressed by assigning it the 'Meta-Reflector' role as described in Step 5 of the plan.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) Extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts Task Agnostic Steps (TAS) towards a high-level goal.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and ensures clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implements designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generates aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Meta-Reflector
roles.description: Analyzes collaborative dynamics, highlights blind spots, and injects meta-perspectives.

roles.title: AI Tutor
roles.description: Facilitates knowledge transfer between agents and ensures understanding of the plan and its steps.

tasks.task: Independently extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) for building a simple TODO app.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Independently extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) for building a simple TODO app.
tasks.name: TASe

tasks.task: Independently extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) for building a simple TODO app.
tasks.name: uTASe

tasks.task: Compare the TAS lists from GPTASe, TASe, and uTASe to identify overlaps, unique contributions, and inconsistencies. Merge into a unified TAS list.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Engineer system prompts for TAS extractors to avoid redundancy, ensure consistent granularity, and guide iterative detail expansion.
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Ensure all team members understand the refined TAS list, providing contextual notes on step importance and interrelations.
tasks.name: aitutor

tasks.task: Analyze collaborative dynamics, highlight blind spots, and inject meta-perspectives into the plan.
tasks.name: fizzlametta

tasks.task: Cycle back through Steps 1-7 to refine TAS, prompts, and collective understanding until the TODO app plan is clear, minimal, and actionable.
tasks.name: Orchestrator
